show_locale_selector.label: Display the language selector

To add the language, you can go to [Language setting](/admin/settings/lang), then go to [Market](/admin/settings/markets) - Language management page once it is completed and add the multilanguage of current market

show_country_selector.label: Display country selector
show_country_selector.info: You need to add at least two market items to make "Display country selector" effective. To add a market, please go to [Market setting](/admin/settings/markets)
